item.title: By: Kevin Han
item.dc:creator: Kevin Han
item.description: (CONTINUED) Also I think that the students activists are powerful and strong in some ways because they are all educated and have got specific ideas and motivation for their goals. Nothing is powerful than fully motivated ones.

(CONTINUED)
Also I think that the students activists are powerful and strong in some ways because they are all educated and have got specific ideas and motivation for their goals. Nothing is powerful than fully motivated ones.

item.title: By: Kevin Han
item.dc:creator: Kevin Han
item.description: I think that the most of the student activism is related to civil rights and it is very interesting that the students are being a huge part of fights for civil rights.
item.content:encoded: I think that the most of the student activism is related to civil rights and it is very interesting that the students are being a huge part of fights for civil rights.
